welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Altadena, a charming city nestled at the base of the San Gabriel Mountains. Known for its beautiful parks, local shops, and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that Altadena has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Whiteman Airport is used for private and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Whiteman Airport is used for flight training and general aviation.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Van Nuys Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to the needs of private jet and charter plane travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport offers a comfortable waiting area, restrooms, and a small cafe for passengers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
